titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of the Lady Compton, August the 4th, 1687. By Lewis Atterbury, L.L.D. and rector of Sywell, in the county of Northampton
titleStmt.author: Atterbury, Lewis, 1656-1731.
